item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 15, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:

21. What performance should you get from different types of storage? (11 points | 3 comments)
22. The Rise of Open Source Time Series Databases (74 points | 29 comments)

28. European Satellite Burns Up for Science (27 points | discuss)
29. Earth to have new mini-moon for two months (3 points | discuss)
